bug.short_desc: Clean-up the TPTP committer lists and project matrix.

long_desc.thetext:
Clean-up the TPTP committer lists and project matrix.
The following is required to clean-up the TPTP committer lists and project matrix:
1) Project Leads will send a note to inactive committers (http://www.eclipse.org/tptp/home/project_info/structure/TPTP_Project_Info.html#Committers) or committers no longer participating in the project as notification that their committer status will be removed in two weeks unless they request otherwise (http://wiki.eclipse.org/TPTP-InactiveCommitter-FormLetter).
2) Compile a documented (e.g. mailing list) master list of candidates for removal to be sent to the Eclipse EMO.
3) Ensure the web UI for the Eclipse project committers (http://www.eclipse.org/projects/lists.php?list=allcommitters) and the Eclipse Portal (http://portal.eclipse.org/) accurately reflect the list of active committers and their CVS access for each of the TPTP components.
4) Ensure the TPTP Project Matrix (http://www.eclipse.org/tptp/home/project_info/structure/TPTP_Project_Info.html#Committers) accurately reflects the list of active committers for each of the TPTP components.
5) Modify the TPTP Project Matrix (http://www.eclipse.org/tptp/home/project_info/structure/TPTP_Project_Info.html#Committers) to only list the active committers since there is no automated way to determine if a committer is active and Project Matrices are maintained for past releases.
Updated hours worked.

(In reply to comment #0)
> 2) Compile a documented (e.g. mailing list) master list of candidates for > removal to be sent to the Eclipse EMO.
http://dev.eclipse.org/mhonarc/lists/tptp-pmc/msg04300.html: Karla Callaghan Kevin O'leary Randy Smith Viacheslav (Slava) Rybalov
http://dev.eclipse.org/mhonarc/lists/tptp-pmc/msg04326.html: Srinivas Doddapaneni Steve Gutz Kari Halsted Cindy Jin Nellie Klump Ruth Lee Kim Letkeman Hubert Leung Serge Lucio Mike Norman Ashish Patel Dan Price James Saliba Dave Smith Christophe Telep Tyler Thessin Melanie Woods
> 3) Ensure the web UI for the Eclipse project committers > (http://www.eclipse.org/projects/lists.php?list=allcommitters) and the Eclipse > Portal (http://portal.eclipse.org/) accurately reflect the list of active > committers and their CVS access for each of the TPTP components.
See https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=214393.
> 5) Modify the TPTP Project Matrix > (http://www.eclipse.org/tptp/home/project_info/structure/TPTP_Project_Info.html#Committers) > to only list the active committers since there is no automated way to determine > if a committer is active and Project Matrices are maintained for past releases.
Requires removing the <active> child element from the <Committer> element in /org.eclipse.hyades.releng.builder/releases/4.5.0/release_4.5.0.xml.

(In reply to comment #0) > Clean-up the TPTP committer lists and project matrix. > > The following is required to clean-up the TPTP committer lists and project > matrix: > > 1) Project Leads will send a note to inactive committers > (http://www.eclipse.org/tptp/home/project_info/structure/TPTP_Project_Info.html#Committers) > or committers no longer participating in the project as notification that their > committer status will be removed in two weeks unless they request otherwise > (http://wiki.eclipse.org/TPTP-InactiveCommitter-FormLetter).
Project Leads: Please ensure the above email is sent to inactive committers for your project:
Guru: http://www.eclipse.org/projects/lists.php?list=byproject&param=tptp.performance
Alex: http://www.eclipse.org/projects/lists.php?list=byproject&param=tptp.monitoring
Joanna: http://www.eclipse.org/projects/lists.php?list=byproject&param=tptp.platform

(In reply to comment #11) > Created an attachment (id=87063) [details] > [Draft 1] Inactive TPTP Committer List >
PMC and Project Leads: Please review.
The following outstanding items need to be resolved by Alex, Guru, and Joanna:
1. [tptp.monitoring] Inactive committers NOT appearing on the Portal and NOT requested to be removed by Alex Nan: Balan Subramanian
2. [tptp.performance] Inactive committers appearing on the Portal and NOT requested to be removed by Guru Nagarajan: Sylvain Duguet Dominique Guilbaud Steve Gutz Kari Halsted Nellie Klump Chris Laffra Ruth Lee Sheldon Lee-Loy Hubert Leung Serge Lucio Mike Norman Ashish Patel Dan Price Christophe Telep Tyler Thessin Melanie Woods
3. [tptp.platform] Inactive committers appearing on the Portal and NOT requested to be removed by Joanna Kubasta: Steve Gutz Navid Mehregani

Created attachment 87165 [Draft 2] Inactive TPTP Committer List
Remove Ruth Lee from tptp.platform.

Hi Paul: It would be best if you could post one final list of committers for removal when you have finished your process. I'll wait for that to happen even if you continue to update this bug for tracking as you move along. Thanks, Sharon

(In reply to comment #14) > Hi Paul: It would be best if you could post one final list of committers for > removal when you have finished your process. I'll wait for that to happen even > if you continue to update this bug for tracking as you move along. Thanks, > Sharon >
Yes, this is our intent. I will send you a note with our final list. I added you to the CC list for this defect to be aware of the request. Please feel free to remove yourself if you are not interested in the gory details:)
Alex A., can you handle Guru's work item in comment #12?
With regard to comment#12 Balan is still considered an active committer in 4.5.

With regards to comment 12, Steve Gutz has requested a transfer of his committer responsibilities to Mohammed Mostafa. I think he (Steve) can safely be removed from the committer list. Navid has asked to remain as an active comitter.
With regards to comment 13, to my understanding, Ruth has asked to remain as an active committer to the Platform project

The following committers have asked(or I have not recvd. a response from them) to be removed from the Trace project
Sylvain Duguet Dominique Guilbaud Steve Gutz Kari Halsted Nellie Klump Chris Laffra Ruth Lee Sheldon Lee-Loy Hubert Leung Serge Lucio Mike Norman Ashish Patel Dan Price Christophe Telep Tyler Thessin Melanie Woods
Thanks, Guru

Sorry for duplication
Created attachment 87891 [Final] Inactive TPTP Committer List
Note sent to Sharon Corbett requesting the removal of inactive TPTP committers (see '[Final] Inactive TPTP Committer List').

(In reply to comment #0)
6) Confirm the TPTP Bugzilla component have owners that are active committers.
Deferred from I5 to I6 with PMC approval.
this is not stop ship
Samson Wai is still showing up as committer in project matrix

(In reply to comment #27) > Samson Wai is still showing up as committer in project matrix >
He will be removed when I complete this defect.
Matthew Mings should be removed from Trace cimmitters list as well.

Paul: Just so we are on the same page...we completed the work up to comment#23 based on the list you provided via email on Jan 25/08. For any other removals, I'm assuming you will send me another list unless there is a change of employer which would need to be addressed ASAP rather than just "inactivity".
Thanks, Sharon

(In reply to comment #30) > Paul: Just so we are on the same page...we completed the work up to comment#23 > based on the list you provided via email on Jan 25/08. For any other removals, > I'm assuming you will send me another list unless there is a change of employer > which would need to be addressed ASAP rather than just "inactivity". > > Thanks, > Sharon >
Hi Sharon. Yes, your portion of this defect is complete. There are no additional removals or changes. The final piece (updating our project web site) is outstanding and will be completed in I7.

Joanna, please update this defect with the required changes to the TPTP Project Matrix based on the recent component reorganization:
http://wiki.eclipse.org/TPTP-AG-20080407#Action_Items

(In reply to comment #29) > Matthew Mings should be removed from Trace cimmitters list as well. >
Done.

(In reply to comment #32) > Joanna, please update this defect with the required changes to the TPTP Project > Matrix based on the recent component reorganization: > http://wiki.eclipse.org/TPTP-AG-20080407#Action_Items
Due to resource changes that will take place post-4.5, I recommend not reorganizing the trace/platform components at this time

Hours worked to complete this defect.
(In reply to comment #0)
> 3) Ensure the web UI for the Eclipse project committers > (http://www.eclipse.org/projects/lists.php?list=allcommitters) and the Eclipse > Portal (http://portal.eclipse.org/) accurately reflect the list of active > committers and their CVS access for each of the TPTP components.
Done. See http://www.eclipse.org/projects/lists.php?list=allbyproject and http://portal.eclipse.org/.
> 4) Ensure the TPTP Project Matrix > (http://www.eclipse.org/tptp/home/project_info/structure/TPTP_Project_Info.html#Committers) > accurately reflects the list of active committers for each of the TPTP > components.
Done. See http://www.eclipse.org/tptp/home/project_info/structure/TPTP_Project_Info.html.
> 5) Modify the TPTP Project Matrix > (http://www.eclipse.org/tptp/home/project_info/structure/TPTP_Project_Info.html#Committers) > to only list the active committers since there is no automated way to determine > if a committer is active and Project Matrices are maintained for past releases. > > Requires removing the <active> child element from the <Committer> element in > /org.eclipse.hyades.releng.builder/releases/4.5.0/release_4.5.0.xml.
Done. See http://www.eclipse.org/tptp/home/project_info/structure/TPTP_Project_Info.html.
> 6) Confirm the TPTP Bugzilla component have owners that are active committers.
Done. Changed to the Project Lead for inactive committers. See https://dev.eclipse.org/committers/bugs/bugz_manager.php. Also confirmed that the TPTP Project Matrix reflects the actual Bugzilla components and their owners.

The 4.5 Project Matrix has been regenerated and verified.
